name: Demeter
headline: AI Back Office Solution for Private Investment Firms
description: Demeter is an AI back-office solution for private investors. Starting with portfolio management, Demeter automates performance tracking, benchmarking, and return analysis, providing insights in minutes instead of weeks.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:finance; industry:b2b; industry:workflow-automation; industry:investments; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Dev Jain, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder & CTO of Demeter. We're building an AI back-office solution for family offices. Before launching Demeter, I was a software engineer at Curri (S19). 

I went to UT Austin and studied mechanical engineering & economics ðŸ¤˜

founders.name: Qiaochu Li, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder & CEO of Demeter. Previously a private equity analyst at Macquarie, investing in companies in various verticals including FinTech and government services with $300 million in total equity deployed. I spend my free time practicing Muay Thai. 

Dual degree in Math and Finance from UT Austin ðŸ¤˜

### Complex entity structures for wealth management and private equity

### Track the metrics you care about across all of your portfolio
## White Labeled
### Allow clients to view portfolios on a site tailored to your firm

generated_description:
Demeter is an innovative startup that emerged from Y Combinator's Batch W25, and itâ€™s making waves in the world of private investment firms. Founded in 2024 and based in San Francisco, Demeter's mission is straightforward: provide an AI-powered back-office solution that significantly streamlines the complexities of portfolio management.

Imagine needing to track your investments, analyze performance data, and benchmark returns, all of which usually take weeks. Demeter flips that script, delivering insights in mere minutes. Their platform automates the labor-intensive processes of performance tracking and data organization, ensuring that fund managers can focus on making informed decisions rather than getting lost in a sea of paperwork.

So, what exactly can Demeter's software do? At its core, it allows users to see their portfolios broken down by asset classes, ensuring complete visibility over diversification. It also automatically imports and organizes files from various investment portals. This means you donâ€™t have to lift a finger to keep your portfolio updated. Advanced features like custom report generation, entity structure management, and a white-labeled portal for clients amplify its appeal, making it suitable for a range of users from private equity firms to family offices.

With a lean team of just two people and a strong partnership with Gustaf Alstromer, the company is focused and agile. The tech stack includes intuitive integrations that support multiple asset classes, enhancing the capabilities of institutions looking for smarter ways to manage their portfolios. 

If you're looking to transform your back-office operations and improve investment decision-making, Demeter might just be the tool youâ€™re after.

For more information, check out their website: [JoinDemeter](https://www.joindemeter.com).
